Title: Slide Show Viewer in Silverlight
Description: A simple slide show viewer in Silverlight.  This has the ability to display whatever images the user chooses at a size that the user can also determine.  Currently supports a cross-fade style transition.  Other transition types will be added in the future.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple slide show viewer in Silverlight. This has the ability to display whatever images the user chooses at a size that the user can also determine. Currently supports a cross-fade style transition. Other transition types will be added in the future.
This project is a simple slide show viewer for Silverlight.
